thread.title: Southeast Asia unites to roast MasterChef UK on rendang

title: Southeast Asia unites to roast MasterChef UK on rendang
text:
Southeast Asia unites to roast MasterChef UK on rendang 12:26pm BST - 02:02 
Malaysians have taken to social media and spoken out in anger after a contestant was kicked off Masterchef UK, for making a traditional chicken dish that was judged not 'crispy' enough. Southeast Asians quickly took to Twitter to say they've never heard of a 'crispy' version of the dish. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Malaysians have taken to social media and spoken out in anger after a contestant was kicked off Masterchef UK, for making a traditional chicken dish that was judged not 'crispy' enough. Southeast Asians quickly took to Twitter to say they've never heard of a 'crispy' version of the dish.
